name: Bach Motif
description:
Listen and repeat melodies with a virtual keyboard.

Most of you might know that Beethoven spent almost half of his life deaf, still continuing his career in music. However, probably fewer have heard about another famous composer, Johan Sebastian Bach, losing his sight only a couple of months before his death.

Help the blind composer to play melodies by ear.

The game can be played with mouse or a keyboard and is completely playable without vision or in any language. The game will start with short musical phrases but they will increase in complexity the more you get right. There is currently no end or victory in the game. You are free to define your own metric for success.

Controls
Piano keys: Mouse or keys: S, E, D, R, F, G, Y, H, U, J, I, K, L
Listen melody again: Space

The game is still under development and probably receives at least some updates in near future. If you have comments or suggestions for improving the game, please leave a comment.
